title: PC-Engine emulator plus 1565 games.
description:
The TurboGrafx-16 (in full, the TurboGrafx-16 Entertainment SuperSystem), known in Japan as the PC Engine( /PÃ„Â«shÃ„Â« Enjin ,is a console video game developed by Hudson Soft and NEC, released in Japan on October 30, 1987,and in North America on August 29, 1989.The TurboGrafx-16 is a 8-bit CPU and a dual 16-bit GPU in addition, it is able to display 482 colors with the one of the 512.In this post you will find the emulator MagicEngine and all games PC Engine.

Instructions:

First download and unzip the self-extracted 7zip file,then copy and paste the file you get on the hard C. Open the folder and run the application "PCE" ,thus opens the emulator press ok in the window that will get and after LOAD ROM,navigate the folder PC ENGINE ROMS.When you do this you will get the list of games,with a click on the title of the game you want the game begins.The controls for the direction of the player is the cursor keys(the cross)the fire button is the A,S,D,Q,W,E(usually used the S,D only in most games)select is the space and start enter.This is, of course, you can change from the CONFIG/KEYBOARD(supported and joypad).
